title: ACCOUNTANCY/ACCOUNTING
de_requirements:
Very good passes in three (3) JUPEB subjects: Accounting, Economics and any one (1) of Business Management, Government and Geography and Mathematics. 

 

Three (3) ‘A’ level passes in Accounting, Economics and any one of Business Management, Government, Mathematics and Geography.
utme_requirements:
Five O/Level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) subjects from the following:

 Geography, Further Mathematics, Financial Accounting/Principles of Accounting, Government, Business Management, Data Processing/Computer Studies, and Biology.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any one of Financial Accounting, Geography, Government and Biology.

title: ACTUARIAL SCIENCE
de_requirements:
Very good passes in three (3) JUBEB subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any one (1) of Financial Accounting, Geography, Government, Biology, Business Studies, Chemistry, Physics, Further Mathematics.

 

Three (3) ‘A’ level passes in Mathematics, Economics and any one (1) of Financial Accounting, Geography, Government, Biology, Business Studies, Chemistry, Physics, Further Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any two (2) of Financial Accounting, Data Processing, Further Mathematics, CRS, IRS, Geography, Government, Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Commerce, Civic Education, Insurance.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any one (1) subject from Financial Accounting, Geography, Government, Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Further Mathematics, and Commerce.

title: ADULT EDUCATION:
de_requirements:
i.    NCE credit/merit in: English, History, French, Geography, Igbo/Yoruba, CRS/IRS, Economics, Government, Business Education and Accounting Education

ii. Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Literature-in-English, Economics, CRS/IRS, Government, History, Igbo/Yoruba, Geography, Mathematics and French

Three ‘A’ Level passes from English, History, French, Geography, Mathematics, Igbo/Yoruba, CRS/IRS, Economics, Government, Office Practice.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three of Literature-in-English, History/Government, Geography, Economics, Commerce, any Nigerian Language, CRS/IRS, French, Civic Education/Social Studies, Biology/Agricultural Science, Financial Accounting, Food & Nutrition, Business Studies and other relevant subjects in Humanity.
subjects: English Language and any three of Literature-in-English, History/Government, French, Geography, Mathematics, any Nigerian Language, CRS/IRS, Economics, Commerce, Civic Education, Social Studies, Financial Accounting, Biology/Agricultural Science, Food & Nutrition.

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
I.                 Very good passes in JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Visual Arts.

        A minimum of lower credit in HND/ND in Architecture with good credit in the assessment of Architectural Portfolio into 200 level.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Fine Arts or Technical Drawing and any one of Economics, Geography, Chemistry, Biology, Painting and Decoration/Building Construction.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any one of Chemistry, Geography, Economics, Biology, Fine Arts.

title: BANKING AND FINANCE
de_requirements:
Very good passes in three (3) JUBEB subjects: Economics and any two (2) from Financial Accounting, Business Management/Studies, Mathematics, Geography and Government.

 

Three (3) ‘A’ level passes in Economics and any two (2) subjects from Financial Accounting, Business Studies, Mathematics, Geography and Government.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) subjects from Financial Accounting, Geography, Government, Commerce, Business Studies, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any one (1) subject from Science, Social Science or Arts.

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Very good passes in the following three (3) JUPEB/A’ level subjects:  Biology, Chemistry and Physics

 Candidates must satisfy the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: BIOLOGY
de_requirements:
i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Botany/Zoology.

(ii) NCE merit accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Mathematics/Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOMEDICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Very good passes in three JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Six O/Level credit passes in English, Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Biology, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics & Physics.

title: BOTANY
de_requirements: Very good passes in the following three (3) JUPEB/A’ level subjects:  Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: BUILDING
de_requirements:
I.      (i)  Three passes in JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

      II.     (ii) OND (Distinction) in Building, Civil Engineering or Quantity Surveying into 200 level.

(iii) HND (Upper Credit) in Building, Civil Engineering or Quantity Surveying into 300 level.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Further Mathematics.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements:
Very good passes in three (3) JUBEB subjects: Economics and any two (2) from Financial Accounting, Business Management/Studies, Mathematics, Geography and Government.

 

Three (3) ‘A’ level passes in Economics and any two (2) of Financial Accounting, Business Management, Government, Geography or Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any two (2) subjects from Arts, Science and Social Sciences.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any one (1) subject from Science, Social Science or Arts.

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
de_requirements:
i.       NCE merit level pass in Business Education (Double Major).

ii.    Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Economics and any two of Accounting, Geography, Government, Business Management.

iii.    Three ‘A’ Level passes in any relevant subjects.

iv.    NCE with Merit passes in two relevant subjects Financial Accounting, Office Management.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two subjects from Arts or Social Sciences, Data Processing/Office Practice, Financial Accounting.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any one of Arts or Social Sciences subject.

title: CELL BIOLOGY & GENETICS
de_requirements: Very good passes in the following three (3) JUPEB/A’ level subjects Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: CHEMICAL ENGINEERING:
de_requirements:
I.       i        Very good passes in three JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry.

      II.      ii     ‘A’ level Cambridge

             iii  HND/ND (Upper Credit) in related Engineering courses.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English, Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics & Physics.

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Very good passes in the following three (3) JUPEB/A’ level subjects Biology, Chemistry and Physics
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Physics and any of Biology or Mathematics.

title: CHINESE STUDIES
de_requirements: Lagos does not accept Direct Entry.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three Arts, Science or Social Sciences. Social Studies and Civic Education are also accepted.
subjects: English Language and any three Arts, Science or Social Sciences.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements:
Passes at the JUPEB, GCE A/level or its equivalents. One of the A/level Subjects should be CRS.


NCE with credit or merit in CRS.
utme_requirements: Five Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, CRS and any other two subjects.
subjects: English Language, CRS and any two (2) from Literate-in-English, History, Government, French, Yoruba, Igbo, Hausa, Visual Arts, Economics and Commerce.

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
I.        (i)  Very good passes in three JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry.

      II.       (ii) ‘A’ level Cambridge

    III.       (iii) HND (Upper Credit) in Civil Engineering courses.

             (iv) ND (Distinction) in Civil Engineering courses.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics & Physics.

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING:
de_requirements:
I.         Very good passes in three JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry.

      II.          ‘A’ level Cambridge

  HND/ND (Upper Credit) in related Engineering courses.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English, Mathematics Further Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics & Physics.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
Very good passes in the following three (3) JUPEB/A’ level subjects: Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry or Biology.

Candidates must have Further Mathematics at 'O' level.

 Direct Entry into Computer Science is four (4) years

 Does not accept NCE/HND
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry or Biology.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any of Chemistry or Biology.

title: CREATIVE ARTS
de_requirements:
Very good passes in three JUPEB/A’ Level subjects:

i.         Theatre Arts: Literature in English and any two of Igbo/Yoruba, CRS/IRS, French, History, Government, Music and Visual Arts.

Also accept NCE at credit/merit level in Drama/Theatre.

ii.       Visual Arts: Visual Arts and any other two subjects.

Also accepts HND/OND at upper credit level, NCE at credit/merit in Fine Arts/Visual Arts or IGCSE.

iii.      Music: Any three from Music, Literature in English, Igbo/Yoruba, CRS/IRS, French, History, Commerce, Government, Economics, Chemistry, Biology, Further Mathematics and Visual Arts.

Accepts OND/NCE at credit/merit level in Drama/Theatre, Music and Fine Arts.

Also accept Diploma or Advanced level in Music from the Royal School of Music, London, Trinity College, London and Musical Society of Nigeria (MUSON) or IGCSE.
utme_requirements:
Theatre Arts

    Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Literature-in-English, Mathematics, and any other two subjects, one of which must be an Art subject.


Music:

Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, one Art subject (which may be Music), and any two subjects.


Visual Arts:

Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, any of Visual Arts/Fine Arts/Photography/Craft Practice/Dyeing and Bleaching/Painting and Decoration, one Art subject and any other subject.
subjects:
Theatre Arts

English Language, Literature-in-English, one Art subject and other subject.


Music:

English Language, one Art subject and any two subjects.


Visual Arts:

English Language, one Art subject and any two subjects.

title: DENTISTRY AND DENTAL SURGERY
de_requirements:
(a) JUPEB/A’ -level passes in Physics Chemistry and Biology. 

(b)  B.Sc. Degree (first class/second class upper) in Medical related fields.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: EARLY CHILDHOOD EDUCATION
de_requirements:
i.       NCE credit/merit in: Primary Education Studies and any teaching subject.

ii.      Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects in Arts, Sciences or Social Sciences.

iii.    Three ‘A’ Level passes in relevant subjects in Arts, Sciences and Social Sciences.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three subjects.
subjects: English Language and any three subjects.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
Very good passes in three JUPEB/A Level subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any one of Accounting, Geography, Government, Physics, Chemistry and Biology. 

Three Cambridge ‘A’ Level passes in Economics, Mathematics and any one of the following: Accounting, Geography, Mathematics, Government, Physics and Biology.
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two subjects from: Biology, Financial Accounting, Geography and Government.
subjects: English, Mathematics, Economics and any one subject from Biology, Financial Accounting, Geography and Government.

title: EDUCATION AND BIOLOGY
de_requirements:
i.        NCE with credit/merit in Biology and any Science subject.

ii.       Very good passes in the following JUPEB subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any one of Physics, Agricultural Science, Health Science.
subjects: English Language, Biology and any two of Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, Integrated Science.

title: EDUCATION AND CHEMISTRY:
de_requirements:
i.        NCE with credit/merit in Chemistry and any Science subject.

ii.       Very good passes in the following JUPEB subjects: Chemistry, Physics and Biology.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, and any two of Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry and any two of Physics, Biology, Agricultural Science and Integrated Science.

title: EDUCATION AND CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements:
i.        NCE credit/merit in CRS and any Arts subject.

ii.     Very good passes in three JUBEP subjects: CRS and any two of Government, History, Literature in English, Geography, Economics, Yoruba, Igbo and French.

iii.    Three ‘A’ Level passes in relevant teaching subject areas.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, CRS and any two of Literature-in-English, any Nigerian Language, History/Government, French, Economics/Commerce, Geography, Civic Education/Social Studies.
subjects: English Language, CRS and any two of Literature-in-English, History/Government, French, any Nigerian Language.

title: EDUCATION AND ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
i.     NCE merit level passes in Economics and any one of Geography, Government, and Financial Accounting.

ii.  Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Economics, Mathematics and other subject from Geography, Government, Accounting.

Three ‘A’ Level passes in Economics and any two of Geography, Government and Commerce.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two of Geography, History/Government, Literature-in English, Financial Accounting and Civic Education/Social Studies.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any one of Geography, History/Government and Literature-in-English.

title: EDUCATION AND ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
i.      NCE credit/merit in English, Literature-in-English, Mathematics and any two subjects.

ii.   Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Literature-in-English and any two of French, Igbo/Yoruba, History, CRS/IRS, Government, Economics and Arabic.

iii.  Three ‘A’ Level passes in relevant teaching subject areas.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature-in-English and any two subjects from Arts, Science and Social Sciences.
subjects: English Language and any three subjects from Arts or Social Sciences.

title: EDUCATION AND FRENCH:
de_requirements:
i.         NCE credit/merit: Subject (French and any other two Arts subjects) NFLV Diploma/Modules I-III.

ii.   Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: French and any two of Literature in English, CRS, IRS, Igbo/Yoruba, Government/History.

iii.      Three ‘A’ Level passes in relevant teaching subject areas.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, and any three subjects from Arts, Science and Social Sciences.
subjects: English Language and any three subjects from Arts or Social Sciences.

title: EDUCATION AND GEOGRAPHY
de_requirements:
i.       Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Geography and any two of Economics, Biology, Government/History, CRS/IRS, Igbo/Yoruba.

ii.      Three ‘A’ Level passes in relevant teaching subject areas.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English, Mathematics, Geography and any two subjects from Science or Social Sciences.
subjects: English language, Geography and any two subjects from Science or Social Sciences.

title: EDUCATION AND HISTORY:
de_requirements:
i.       NCE credit/merit in: History, Social Studies and Political Science.

ii.  Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: History and any two of CRS/IRS, Literature-in-English, Igbo/Yoruba, Government, French and Geography.

iii.    Three ‘A’ Level passes in relevant teaching subject areas.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, History/Government and any two subjects from Arts or Social Sciences.
subjects: English Language and any three subjects from Arts or Social Sciences.

title: EDUCATION AND IGBO:
de_requirements:
i.       NCE credit/merit in Igbo and any two Arts subjects.

ii.     Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Igbo and two of French, Yoruba, Literature-in-English, CRS/IRS, Geography and Government/History and O/Level requirements.

Three ‘A’ Level passes in relevant teaching subject areas.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, and any three subjects from Arts, Science and Social Sciences.
subjects: English Language and any three subjects from Arts or Social Sciences.

title: EDUCATION AND INTEGRATED SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
i.        NCE with at least credit/merit in Chemistry and any Science subjects.

ii.       Very good passes in the following JUPEB subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

iii.     Three ‘A’ Level passes in Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two of Chemistry, Biology, Agricultural Science.
subjects: English Language, Biology and any two of Chemistry, Physics, Agricultural Science

title: EDUCATION AND ISLAMIC STUDIES:
de_requirements:
i.       NCE credit/merit in: Islamic Studies.

ii.   Very good passes in three JUPEB subject: IRS and any two of Government/History, Literature in English, French, Yoruba/Igbo and Economics.

iii.    Three ‘A’ Level passes in relevant teaching subject areas.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Religious Studies (IRS) and two of Literature-in-English, any Nigerian Language, History/ Government, French/ Arabic, Economics/Commerce, Civic Education/Social Studies.
subjects: English Language and Islamic Religious Studies (IRS) and any two of Literature-in-English, History/ Government, French/ Arabic, Geography, Mathematics, Yoruba/ Igbo, CRS, Economics/Commerce.

title: EDUCATION AND MATHEMATICS
de_requirements:
i.        NCE with credit/merit in Mathematics and any Science subject from Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology

ii.       Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry.

iii.     Three ‘A’ Level passes in Mathematics and two Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two of Chemistry, Biology, Agricultural Science, Further Mathematics, Computer Studies/Data Processing.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any one of Chemistry, Biology, Computer Studies, Data Processing.

title: EDUCATION AND PHYSICS
de_requirements:
i.        NCE with credit/merit in Physics and one of Mathematics, Chemistry, and Biology.

ii.       Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Physics, Chemistry and any one of Biology or Mathematics.

iii.   Three ‘A’ Level passes to includes Physics, Mathematics
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, and any two of Biology, Further Mathematics, Agricultural Science, Integrated Science, Computer Studies/Data Processing.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Mathematics/Chemistry and one of Biology, Agricultural Science.

title: EDUCATION AND YORUBA
de_requirements:
i.      NCE credit/merit in Primary Education Studies and any two teaching subjects.

ii.    Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Arts or Social Science.

iii.   Three ‘A’ Level passes in Yoruba, and any of English, CRS/IRS, Igbo, French, History, Geography and Arabic.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, and any three subjects from Arts, Science and Social Sciences.
subjects: English Language and any three subjects from Arts or Social Sciences.

title: EDUCATIONAL ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements:
i.        NCE credit/merit in Arts, Social Sciences.

ii.  Very good passes in any three JUBEP subjects: Economics, Literature-in-English, CRS/IRS, Government, History, Geography, Igbo/Yoruba and French.

iii   Three ‘A’ Level passes from English Language, History, French, Geography, Mathematics, Igbo/Yoruba, CRS/IRS, Economics and Government.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two of Literature-in-English, History, Government, Economics, Geography, any Nigerian Language, CRS/IRS.
subjects: English Language and any three of Literature-in-English, History, Government, Geography, any Nigerian Language, CRS/IRS, Economics.

title: EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATIONS
de_requirements:
1.   Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Literature in English, Economics, CRS/IRS, Government, History, Igbo, Yoruba, French and Geography.

2.   Three ‘A’ Level passes in Literature in English, Economics, CRS/IRS, Government, History, Igbo, Yoruba, French and Geography.

3.    NCE – Any two of Literature in English, Economics, CRS/IRS, Government, History, Igbo, Yoruba, French and Geography.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and three of Literature in English Language, History, Government, Geography, Economics, Igbo/Yoruba, CRS/IRS, French and Civic Education.
subjects: English Language and any three of Literature in English, History, French, Geography, Yoruba/Igbo, CRK/IRS, Economics, Government, Civic Education.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
I.              Very good passes in three JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry.

      II.             A’ level Cambridge

     HND/ND (Upper Credit) in related Engineering courses.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English, Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics & Physics.

title: ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements: Very good passes in three JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: Literature-in-English and any two of Igbo/Yoruba, CRS, IRS, History, Government, Music, Fine Arts and French.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature-in-English and any two of French, History/Government, CRS/IRS and any Nigerian Language.
subjects: English Language, Literature-in-English and any two of CRS/IRS, French, History, Government and any Nigerian Language.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
I.   Three passes in JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: Mathematics, Economics, Geography and Chemistry.

II.  ND with minimum of Upper Credit in Estate Management or relevant field into 200 level.

III. HND with minimum of Upper Credit in Estate Management or relevant field into 300 level.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any two of Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Technical Drawing, Agricultural Science, Fine Arts/Building.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any one of Geography, Biology, Physics and Chemistry.

title: FINANCE
de_requirements:
Very good passes in three (3) JUBEB subjects: Economics and any two (2) from Financial Accounting, Business Management/Studies, Mathematics, Geography and Government.

 

Three (3) ‘A’ level passes in Economics and any two (2) subjects from Financial Accounting, Business Studies, Mathematics, Geography and Government.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) subjects from Financial Accounting, Geography, Government, Commerce, Business Studies, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any one (1) subject from Science, Social Science or Arts.

title: FISHERIES
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Chemistry, Biology, Botany, Zoology, Agricultural Science Geography, Mathematics (pure & applied), Physics, Geology and Economics.

 

(ii)NCE Agriculture
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and English Language plus any other Science subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science subject.

title: FISHERIES
de_requirements: Very good passes in the following two (2) JUPEB/A’ level subjects:  Biology, Chemistry or Physics with minimum of 6 points or as agreed by admissions.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: FRENCH
de_requirements:
i.      Very good passes in JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: French and any two of Igbo/Yoruba, CRS/IRS, History, Government, Literature-in-English, Music and Fine Arts. 

ii.       NCE in French/NFLV, Diploma/Diplôme Supérieur (MODULE III), DALF (France), CEGEP (Canada), Baccalaureate, CAP and BTS.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three Arts or Social Sciences. Civic Education and Computer Studies are also accepted.
subjects: English Language and any three Arts or Social Sciences.

title: FRENCH
de_requirements:
i.     Very good passes in JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: French and any two of Igbo/Yoruba, CRS/IRS, History, Government, Literature-in-English, Music and Fine Arts. 

ii.       NCE in French/NFLV, Diploma/Diplôme Supérieur (MODULE III), DALF (France), CEGEP (Canada), Baccalaureate, CAP and BTS.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three Arts or Social Sciences. Civic Education and Computer Studies are also accepted.
subjects: English Language and any three Arts or Social Sciences.

title: GEOGRAPHY
de_requirements: Very good passes in three JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: Geography and any two of Economics, Chemistry, Biology, Physics, Mathematics and Government.
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography and any two subjects from Science or Social Sciences.
subjects: English Language, Geography and any two from Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Economics, Government and Mathematics.

title: GEOLOGY
de_requirements: Very good passes in the following JUPEB/A’ level subjects: Mathematics, Physics and or Chemistry.  Candidates must have ‘O’ level credit pass in Biology.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Further Mathematics.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: GEOPHYSICS
de_requirements: Very good passes in the following three (3) JUPEB/A’ level subjects: Physics, Chemistry Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Further Mathematics.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: HEALTH EDUCATION
de_requirements:
i.         NCE credit/merit in Physical Education/Physical & Health Education/Human Kinetics & Health Education.

ii.   Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Biology/Health Science/Physical Education and one other Science subject.

iii.      Unilag 2-year Diploma in HKE.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology/Health Science/Physical Education, one Science subject and any other subject.
subjects: English Language, Biology and any two Science subjects.

title: HISTORY AND STRATEGIC  STUDIES
de_requirements: Very good passes in three JUPEB/A’ Level subjects: History and/or Government and any two or one of Igbo/Yoruba, CRS/IRS, Literature-in-English, French, Music and Fine Arts.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, History/Government and any two of Literature-in-English, CRS/IRS, Civic Education and any Nigerian Language.
subjects: English Language, History and/or Government and any one or two Arts or Social Sciences.

title: HOME ECONOMICS AND EDUCATION
de_requirements:
i.        NCE in Home Economics, Catering and Hotel Management, Clothing & Textile Management.

ii.    Very good passes in three JUPEB Subjects: Chemistry, Biology and one other subject from Home Economics, Physics, Food & Nutrition, Home Management and clothing & Textile

iii.  Three ‘A’ Level passes in any two relevant Science subjects of Chemistry and any one of Biology, Botany and Agricultural Science, Physics.

iv.     ND with Distinction in Hotel Management, Tourism, Catering and Hotel Management, or any other related course.

subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: NURSING SCIENCE
de_requirements:
·         All candidates for direct entry must satisfy the basis minimum entry requirement of 5 credit passes at WASSCE/GCE ‘O’ Level or its equivalent including English language, Biology, Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics at one sitting.

·         The candidate must be registered with the Nursing and Midwifery Council of Nigeria (NMCN) as RN/RM.

·         Candidate with general certificate of education at advanced level or its equivalent in at least two subjects from the following may also be admitted:

                                i.            Biology

                              ii.            Chemistry

                            iii.            Physics

                            iv.            Zoology

·         A candidate who has a good degree in any of the health related subjects from any recognized University, and has fulfilled the minimum entry requirements of the College of Medicine degree programme may also be admitted.

·         Without prejudice to all the above requirements, the department may also conduct an interview for prospective candidates.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
